com.netflix.zuul.dependency.cassandra.hystrix

Class HystrixCassandraGetRowsByKeys<RowKeyType>

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.netflix.hystrix.HystrixCommand<K>
      • com.netflix.zuul.dependency.cassandra.hystrix.AbstractCassandraHystrixCommand<com.netflix.astyanax.model.Rows<RowKeyType,java.lang.String>>
        • com.netflix.zuul.dependency.cassandra.hystrix.HystrixCassandraGetRowsByKeys<RowKeyType>
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    com.netflix.hystrix.HystrixExecutable<com.netflix.astyanax.model.Rows<RowKeyType,java.lang.String>>

    public class HystrixCassandraGetRowsByKeys<RowKeyType>
extends AbstractCassandraHystrixCommand<com.netflix.astyanax.model.Rows<RowKeyType,java.lang.String>>
    Fetches values in multiple rows from Cassandra using row keys.

    Retrieves all columns by default or can be filtered with the withColumns method.

    • Nested Class Summary

      • Nested classes/interfaces inherited from class com.netflix.hystrix.HystrixCommand
